casebody.data:
STATE
v.
MYERS 2014-1862 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 20, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's motion for appointment of Elizabeth Arrick as counsel. Motion granted. Elizabeth Arrick is appointed to represent appellant for the purpose of filing an application for reopening pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 11.06.
